lead_paragraph: Colorado Rockies shortstop Jose Reyes was placed on paid leave Tuesday under Major League Baseball's new domestic violence policy pending completion of criminal proceedings. He will not report to spring training.

headline.print_headline: Jose Reyes Placed on Paid Leave Pending Criminal Proceedings
headline.main: Jose Reyes Placed on Paid Leave Pending Criminal Proceedings
